We already know that Obama's wife is racist; that's a no-brainer. But it seems Obama has ridiculed the bible in the past. Don't believe me? The do some research. It's not very difficult, actually. His "guns and religion" comments may not have been sufficent evidence that he's not a Christian, but if the video isn't, then what is? He mocked Christianity in a jest, and the fools in his audience laughed. Wellp, we now know that he wasn't going to that church for the sermons. He was definitely going there to feed his racism, because frankly, sermons and anti-white bigotry are the only things you'll find in that place. From this, I could conclude that he's either an atheist, or a Muslim. But this fear is the least of my concerns; I don't want a racist in office.
